EmailTemplate.subject: Keep Selling - Launch a Storefront Today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STOP answering individual RFQ’s. START posting your listings and price on GoDirect Trade.
STOP staying online late at night so you’re available to customers. START selling through your storefront so you’re open 24/7.
STOP selling only to the customers that know your phone number. START selling to over 6,200 users across 2,700+ companies around the world.
We know you will love the digital channel and that’s why we’re providing sellers with a no-obligation, 6 months free of charge trial. Click below to launch your storefront in less than five minutes. LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/bWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
